body: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/3t6avD66wnB1AMvHqvtGGn2GUFLryVdgvxkhS2yudd1wWwSHzl*2hwFwiUjyQ1lQ4quN5G7e4D0ataVE2MIEhgmLNO1H5NQ1/Canvasat230006.png)Helloo there   I did a simple test for a sheading device uing LB SHDDesigner. I need to block the sun from mid march to mid September from 12 to 4 pm. Sunpath generates 600 vectors SHDDesigner components generates 2400 srfs based on 0.56m distance between them. Is this normal? The Gh file becomes super slow. thank you all
topic: SHD Designer generating thousands of surfaces
